name: Crown Royale
description: Crown Royale is a sweet indica-dominant hybrid that blends the best of parent strains Blueberry and Purple Kush together. This flower is a feast for the eyes with bright purple hues and deep green foliage. Just as delightful on the palate, Crown Royale exhibits notes of the forest floor with piney aromas and a telltale berry tartness. These scents show up in the flavor as a sweeter, fruiter pine. Enjoy this strain for pervasive physical effects that dull pain, nausea, and stress.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Happy, Relaxed, Sleepy, Aroused, Pain, Stress, Depression, Cramps, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
